content: There is an extension http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/workflow-episodeOfCare which is defined for many clinical resource types, is there a reason others weren't considered, specifically in my case Flag and DocumentReference
They should be allowed as part of the context. Can you submit change requests?

For R4 can I just update the extension for local usage?
(looking to make the error go away for my IG)
